DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether treatment single multiple oral dos AZD1446 1 week effect Quantified Electroencephalography Event-Related Potentials patient Alzheimers Disease . The total treatment period 9 week , divide 5 equally long sub-periods 7 day 4 wash-out period 7 day .
